'''SQL Server Management Studio''' (SSMS) is a software application first launched with [[Microsoft]] [[Microsoft SQL Server|SQL Server 2005]] that is used for configuring, managing, and administering all components within [[Microsoft SQL Server]].
'''SQL Server Management Studio'''（SSMS）是[[微软]]的一個與其[[數據庫]]產品[[Microsoft SQL Server]]配合使用的產品，以便於設定、配置及管理其元件。

An '''audit trail''' (also called '''audit log''') is a security-relevant chronological record, set of records, and/or destination and source of records that provide documentary evidence of the sequence of activities that have affected at any time a specific operation, procedure, or event.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.cnss.gov/Assets/pdf/cnssi_4009.pdf |title=National Information Assurance (IA) Glossary |publisher=[[Committee on National Security Systems]] |pages=4 |date=7 August 1996 |accessdate=7 March 2012 |format=PDF}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.atis.org/glossary/definition.aspx?id=5572 |title=ATIS Telecom Glossary 2012 - audit trail |publisher=[[Alliance for Telecommunications Industry Solutions]] (ATIS) Committee PRQC |year=2012 |accessdate=7 March 2012 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130313232104/http://www.atis.org/glossary/definition.aspx?id=5572 |archivedate=13 March 2013 |df= }}</ref> Audit records typically result from activities such as [[financial transaction]]s,<ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.sec.gov/news/press/2010/2010-86.htm |title=SEC Proposes Consolidated Audit Trail System to Better Track Market Trades |publisher=U.S.

'''稽核軌跡'''（也稱為'''檔案日誌'''）是與安全相關的時間順序記錄、記錄集和/或目的地和記錄來源，它們提供了在任何時候影響特定操作，程序的活動順序的文件證據或事件<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.cnss.gov/Assets/pdf/cnssi_4009.pdf |title=National Information Assurance (IA) Glossary |trans-title=國家信息保障（IA）詞彙表 |publisher=[[Committee on National Security Systems]] |pages=4 |date=1996-08-07 |access-date=2012-03-07 |format=PDF |language=en }}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.atis.org/glossary/definition.aspx?id=5572 |title=ATIS Telecom Glossary 2012 - audit trail |trans-title=ATIS電信詞彙表2012 - 審計線索 |publisher=[[Alliance for Telecommunications Industry Solutions]] (ATIS) Committee PRQC |year=2012 |access-date=2012-03-07 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130313232104/http://www.atis.org/glossary/definition.aspx?id=5572 |archivedate=2013-03-13 |language=en }}</ref>。稽核軌跡通常來自一些活動，例如：[[金融交易]]<ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.sec.gov/news/press/2010/2010-86.htm |title=SEC Proposes Consolidated Audit Trail System to Better Track Market Trades |publisher=U.S.

DIKO Diko 安裝導覽 v1.0
DIKO does not only serve as a platform for users to share their “knowledge”, it also enhances the document collaboration among the users in the corporation.
DIKO不僅可以作為用戶分享他們“知識”的平台，而且還增強了企業內各個使用者之間的文件協作。
DIKO<t0/> consists of two storage media namely Database and File System.
DIKO由兩個儲存媒體組成，即資料庫和檔案系統。
DIKO<t0/> is a web-based Knowledge Management System which maintains the documents integrity and restricts the document access.
DIKO<t0/>是一個基於網絡的知識管理系統，負責維護文件的完整性、並限制文件訪問。
DIKO<t0/> is a web-based, UNICODE-supported Document Management System.
DIKO<t0/>是一個網路應用架構、並且支援UNICODE的檔案管理系統。
DIKO<t0/> is by default to be installed on C drive.
預設情況下，DIKO<t0/>安裝在C磁碟機上。

Database stores all document records, audit trails, user groups, etc. File System stores all encrypted files, PDF renditions, full text index, etc. Both storage media should be backed at the same time to ensure data synchronization.
資料庫存儲所有檔案記錄、稽核軌跡、使用者群組等。檔案系統存儲所有加密檔、PDF格式、全文索引等。應同時備份兩個存儲媒體，以確保資料同步。

This check box sets the database to single user mode before performing the restore operations, and sets the database to multi-user mode when complete.

To restore <t0/>DIKO<t1/> is simple, put the database and file system backup from the NAS to the default location (i.e. C drive) and <t2/>DIKO<t3/> will be in production again.
要復原<t0/>DIKO<t1/>很簡單，將資料庫和檔案系統備份從NAS放到默認位置（即C磁碟機），<t2/>DIKO<t3/>將再次投入生產。
To restore the file system, simply copy the whole <t0/>DIKO<t1/> folder with its content and put it <t2/>back <t3/>on C drive (or <t4/>DIKO<t5/> installed hard drive).
要復原檔案系統，只需複製整個<t0/>DIKO<t1/>文件夾及其內容，並將之放<t2/>回到<t3/>C磁碟機（或<t4/>DIKO<t5/>安裝的硬碟）上。

We are trying to provide you a step-by-step tutorial lesson about setting up the DIKO system.
